com.controller.timer

Class TimerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.controller.timer.TimerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TimerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Created by ivan on 26/04/17. Class responsible for running the timers and updating the GUI labels that correspond to time
